name: Golf Days:Excite Resort Tour
description:
Compete world's golfers and score free!

"Orthodox golf game, but controls are very simple!
Your opponents will be displayed in multi-window!
It'll make you feel that you're actually there!
Aim world's top golfer by playing online tournaments!"

-Orthodox 3D golf game with easy control!
Power cursor and spin window will forecast ball's course and falling spot.
You can check the field's relief and green's slope too!

-Correspond multi-window
Your opponent's stroke will be displayed anytime.
By watching their play, it'll give a presence that you're actually playing together.

-Enjoy various game modes
World Tournament: Tournament that you can compete with golfers around the world everyday!
Match Play: You can enjoy match with opponent that fits to your level.
Tournament: 6 round tournaments that is eligible to join. Let's conquer all rounds!
Practice: You can play all holes alone or with 3 people free.

-Customize your status free!
You can customize your character free!
Upgrade your favorite status that fits to your play style!

-Use items to upgrade your character more!
There are items that'll support you: A ball that extends flying distance, golf club set that raise control, etc.!
Use these items wisely to extend your strategies!

-Change wear and create your own character!
We've prepared various types of wears, accessories, hair style, and hair color in this game!
Let's make your own character and boast it to world!

-Application Info.
Compatible devices：iOS 8.0 or later
Price: Free (There are some pay items)
-Please check User Policy before you use it.
-iPhone is a trademark of Apple inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries
-These descriptions will may be changed without notice.
